title: The battle for Madagascar and The Wars of the Roses
itunes:title: The battle for Madagascar and The Wars of the Roses
itunes:subtitle: Tim Benbow describes the Second World War battle for Madagascar, while Sarah Gristwood reflects on the role of women in the Wars of the Roses.
description:
Tim Benbow describes the Second World War battle for Madagascar, while Sarah Gristwood reflects on the role of women in the Wars of the Roses.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
